=======================
Next Steps Follow-up
=======================

"Next Steps" is designed to provide additional support to individuals along their legal journey. In phase 1, we are focusing on making the tool available to caseworkers at OTIS partner organizations to subscribe clients to these next steps.

Phase 2 envisions expanding it to website visitors and users of our ILAOHelps! SMS text line.
